actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A bill to authorize a supplemental appropriation for the extension of credit and the issuance of guaranties under the Arms Export Control Act for the fiscal year 1978, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Supplemental Security Assistance Authorization Act - Authorizes supplemental appropriations to carry out the Arms Export Control Act in fiscal year 1978, to be available without regard to aggregate foreign military sales credit limitations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize a supplemental appropriation for the extension of credit and the issuance of guaranties under the Arms Export Control Act for the fiscal year 1978, and for other purposes.
